title: Low priority queue for no reason...
body: I was just playing league before and I had an error says something about disconnecting from the server so i couldn't join the match. So i restarted client and then i got a leavebuster from this usually i dont. Before you say just stop leaving games i didnt leave the game i got disconnected....and i got a leavebuster.WHY YOU DO THIS TO MEH RIOT :c.......

replies.body: Multiple threads just clogs up the board.
